text: @ewnupdates She is one of a lot that makes this govt, this ANC govt, be a laughing stock 😱 My kids, small kids, got worried when I told them I had to work from home during level 5. Was she not worried? A whole social development minister did not know what the impact of COVID-19 would be!?
